    S

    SaveProperties - Class in com.ltsllc.miranda.servlets
    A servlet that saves any new values from the properties page To avoid unpredictable results, the request is assumed to contain a table whose row adhere to a certain form: that is <property name><property value> where the property name must be identical to those used by the properties page.
